Question.Subject: What's a good fashion/personal xanga I can follow?
Question.Content: I love fashion and used to follow luellalovex3.xanga.com but she doesn't get on anymore.. Are there any sites like that I can follow?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Style rookie!!!!!!!! by Tavi Genverson(I think thats her last name) It is the best fashion blog ever!!!! she inclues pictures of her outfits she gets from thrift stores , dresses celbs have worn and etc.....
check it out: http://tavi-thenewgirlintown.blogspot.com/
